metadata.title: CVE-2023-26118 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Versions of the package angular from 1.4.9 are vulnerable to RegularExpression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via the <input type="url"> element dueto the usage of an insecure regular expression in the input[url]functionality. Exploiting this vulnerability is possible by a largecarefully-crafted input, which can result in catastrophic backtracking.

criterions.comment: angular.js package in oracular is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-05-15').
